name: Memory Match Game for Kids
description:
Matching fun for your little one! Memory Match is a fun children's game that improve memory skills, concentration and patience. This app is perfect for little fingers and minds. Help your children figure out which cards match with this simple, intuitive game. It is easy to learn, and simple to play.

Do you want to enhance your kids' memory? Then Memory Game for Kids is the perfect app. The app has 3 different themes which kids will love playing.

* Helps support early object recognition
* The challenge to solve memory games in the least number of moves possible.
* Kids would love to compete against their parents, siblings or friends to see who completes faster.
* Cute and captivating images make playing the game all the more interesting.
* Kids will sharpen their brain playing memory games.
* They will learn to identify different objects from their images.
* Fun with education at the same time.
* The parents could spend quality parent-child time together with this app.

This is a great app for education in preschool, kindergarten and school and will help them with tests by improving their focus and attention.

If you prefer an ads free experience, you can download the "Memory Match Premium" app: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/memory-match-premium/id1436699655

HOW TO PLAY Memory Match Game for Kids:
At first your child will pick a theme pack to play.
When your kid taps on any card, it will be opened and shown an image. Next he needs to find the matching image by flipping a second card. If it is a matchup, a sound will be played and both cards will disappear. If the second card will be show a different image both cards will be closed.
